news.content: Floods' new EP, 1880, is out! You can find it on our Bandcamp, on Spotify, on Itunes, and Google Play Music. Physical copies of CDs can be purchased at shows.
Floods is releasing a new EP, 1880, it will be available on our Bandcamp and on Spotify and Itunes on 7/14/2017. Physical CDs can be bought at shows.

Floods is going on tour later this summer, check out the list below.
  • 8/4 House show - Denver, Co
  • 8/5 Lion's Lair​ - Denver, Co
  • 8/6 The Shredder​ - Boise, ID
  • 8/7 Twilight Cafe and Bar​ - Portland, OR
  • 8/9 Funhouse Seattle - Seattle, WA
  • 8/11 Why Not Fest - Minot, ND
  • 8/12 DogMahal DogHaus​ - Grand Forks, ND
Floods is now on Spotify! Find us here.
The debut album, Echo, has been released and is available on our Bandcamp. Physical CDs can be bought at shows or here.
The debut album, Echo, is finished and scheduled to be released on 8/12/2016. Visit our Bandcamp for digital copies. CDs and cassettes will be available at shows.
